DOC.detailed_description: Baseline lab include complete blood count ( CBC ) , comprehensive metabolic panel ( CMP ) , Hemoglobin A1C , lipid profile . All labs drawn fast state Visit 1 : Subjects arrive fast overnight ( 10 hour ) 7 7:30 . An indwell intravenous cannula place anterior cubital vein blood draw . A blood sample research labs urine sample collect . Blood pressure , heart rate weight measure . Subjects consume either High Fat High Calorie ( HFHC ) meal HFHC meal plus fiber ( FiberOne Original cereal ) accord randomization . Fiber consume HFHC meal ( 28 gram total , 14 gram meal ) . HFHC meal include egg muffin sandwich , sausage muffin sandwich two hash brown contain 88g carbohydrate , 51 g fat ( 33 % saturate ) 34 g protein . 35 ml blood obtain 1h , 2h , 3h 5 h 5 ml 15 min,30 min,45 min,75 min 90 min . A total 165 ml ( 11 tablespoon ) blood collect . . Visit 2 : Subjects return 1 week later overnight fasting ( 10 hour ) 7 7:30 . Blood pressure , heart rate weight measure . Baseline blood urine sample collect subject cross receive second meal ( HFHC HFHC fiber ) . Visit detail similar visit 1 . After , subject discharge study .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Men woman 18 80 year age 2 . Nonsmoker ( last cigarette least one month ago ) 3 . Type 2 diabetes least 1 year 4 . Body mass index > 30 kg/m2 1 . Participation concurrent clinical trial 2 . Pregnancy premenopausal woman try pregnant 3 . Patients incompetent give consent 4 . Patients nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug steroid 5 . Concurrent disease could disrupt intestinal epithelium increase permeability endotoxin , ie Celiac Crohns disease . 6 . Hepatic disease ( transaminase > 3 time normal ) 7 . Renal impairment ( serum creatinine > 1.5 mg/dl ) 8 . History drug alcohol abuse 9 . Use counter prescribe probiotic supplement . 10 . Recent current antibiotic use . 11 . Coronary artery disease ( CAD ) : document history myocardial infarction , angioplasty/stent placement , angina , exercise EKG positive ischemia angiographic evidence CAD
